Uses of Interface
org.openliberty.openaz.azapi.AzRequestContext

Packages that use AzRequestContext
org.openliberty.openaz.azapi The AzApi package contains the interfaces that must be implemented by a provider. 
org.openliberty.openaz.azapi.pep The goal of this package is to simplify the creation of Policy Enforcement Points or peps built on top of the azapi package (note that where the class descriptions below are blank, that generally means that the class is primarily used for lower layer non-application facing operations). 
 

Uses of AzRequestContext in org.openliberty.openaz.azapi
 

Methods in org.openliberty.openaz.azapi that return AzRequestContext
 AzRequestContext AzRequestContextFactory.createAzRequestContext()
          Returns a new AzRequestContext object that the AzAPI caller may use to populate with all the necessary information required (in the form of AzAttributes) for one or more XACML Authorization requests.
 

Methods in org.openliberty.openaz.azapi with parameters of type AzRequestContext
 AzResponseContext AzService.decide(AzRequestContext azRequestContext)
          Returns the authorization decision(s) in an AzResponseContext object.
 java.util.Collection<AzAttribute<T>> AzAttributeFinder.findAzAttribute(AzRequestContext azReqCtx, AzEntity<T> azEntity, AzAttribute<T> azAttribute)
          Finds one or more AzAttributes that match the criteris specified in the parameters.
 java.util.Set<AzResourceActionAssociation> AzService.query(java.lang.String scope, AzRequestContext azRequestContext, boolean allowedNotAllowed)
          Returns the set of AzResourceActionAssociations that are allowed (or not allowed, depending on boolean below) for the specified "scope", where "scope" is a String expression representing a set of target resources.
 AzResponseContext AzService.queryVerbose(java.lang.String scope, AzRequestContext azRequestContext)
          Returns an AzResponseContext that contains all the results for queries that are within the specified "scope", where "scope" is a String expression representing a set of target resources.
 

Uses of AzRequestContext in org.openliberty.openaz.azapi.pep
 

Methods in org.openliberty.openaz.azapi.pep that return AzRequestContext
 AzRequestContext PepRequest.getAzRequestContext()
          This method is used to allow access to the underlying AzRequestContext that was created by the PepRequestFactory.
